LanguageData.Monster.label: Lair of monsters
LanguageData.Monster.description: Deep underground, in the musty corridors of Vault, something terrifying has taken up residence. Once a place teeming with life, with steel doors protecting the inhabitants from a nuclear apocalypse, the vault is now home to nightmarish creatures mutated by years of isolation..
LanguageData.MutantClan.label: Mutant clan
